R

RandomFigureGenerator - Class in model
There are 7 types of tetrominos in tetris game This class implements the random generator of new figures
RandomFigureGenerator() - Constructor for class model.RandomFigureGenerator
Creating new Random instance.
refreshNextFigure(Figure) - Method in class view.GUI_Tetris
Refreshing the next figure panel with given figure.
refreshNextFigure(Figure) - Method in class view.NextFigurePanel
Displaying the next figure which will be on board.
refreshScoreAndLevel(int, int) - Method in class view.GUI_Tetris
Refresing the score and level panel with given parameters.
refreshScoreAndLevel(int, int) - Method in class view.ScoresLevelPanel
Refreshing actual scores and level
refreshTopScore(int) - Method in class view.GUI_Tetris
Refreshing the topScore panel with given parameter.
refreshTopScore(int) - Method in class view.ScoresLevelPanel
Refreshing top score
removeBlock(int) - Method in class model.Figure
Removing block at given index
removeFullLines() - Method in class model.Board
Removing the lines which are full and putting down blocks if needed after removing lines.
reset() - Method in class model.BoardScore
reset the board score, setting the Top Score and reseting values of other attributes
resetBoard() - Method in class model.Board
Reseting board to original state.
rotate(boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Figure
The method, which is responsible for rotating the figures.
rotate(boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Figure_I
For tetromino "I" rotate method has to be overriden because "central" Block is diffrent for different rotation phase.
rotate(boolean[][]) - Method in class model.Figure_O
Figure_O cannot be rotated, so the parent method is overriden.
